text: If you can share that would be great!

If I have a Image field type in my HubDB, how do I output the image sizes using HubL? Looking at the API the table shows:
```{
name: "brand_logo",
label: "Brand Logo",
id: 6,
deleted: false,
foreignIdsById: { },
foreignIdsByName: { },
type: "IMAGE"
},```
I have tried `row.brand_logo.url.width` and `row.brand_logo.url.src.width` but cannot find the hubl variable to returning the image type hubdb field

Hello everyone, I am using below hubl code for filters:
{% set queryparam = queryparam~"&category__in="~request.query_dict.category|urlencode %}
But recently in category column someone added *&* value like this: People & Culture

When anyone search result for People & Culture then it convert that & sign into & and it display no results. Is there anyway to handle & sign for queryparam?

Hey Guys
I have created the custom module for header section. I am using the below mentioned code to upload logo dynamically through the template:
`{% logo`
                `override_inherited_src="{{ module.logo_field.override_inherited_src }}"`
                `src="{{ module.logo_field.src }}"`
                `alt="{{ module.logo_field.alt }}"`
                `width='130'`
                `suppress_company_name="{{ module.logo_field.suppress_company_name }}"`
              `%}`

But, I want to add the link to logo so that we can changes the logo link as per requirement through the template and reuse it.
Kindly help me how i can do this
